subject: Implementation of GST Act; 2017 in NHAI- Exemption of application of GST on Annuity payments-reg.
text: HTr& Trzv TTGAf   9rfejabut Phone . 91-11-25074100/25074200 (7v dftar- 3 {rTHrZf HATaq4) Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 Mi R1 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 4-5 U4 6, #4rr-10, ETDI, Tf Rrrft-110075 Dated: 23.10.201Z 6-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka New Delhi-110075 CIRCULAR 3.3.17) Sub: Implementation of GST Act, 2017 in NHAI Exemption of application of GST on Annuity payments reg: Ref:- (1) Circular 3.3.14 dt: 29.09.2017 2) Circular 3.3.15 dt. 04.10.2017 Circular 3.3.16 dt. 04.10.2017 Memorandum dt: 09.10.2017 In continuation to the Memorandum dated 09.10.2017, it is noticed that Ministry of Finance (Dept. of Revenue) has published Notification No. 33/2017 Integrated Tax (Rate) dt: 13.10.2017 on the issue of Annuity Payments which is as under: "Service by way of access to a road or a bridge on payment of annuity applicable GST is Nil (SL No. 24A, Heading 9967) " 2_ As such, no payment against GST shall be made by NHAI on Annuity Payments. This is issued with the approval of Competent Authority.
